import React, { useState } from 'react'; import "../Pages/Admin.css" function AddProduct() { const [selectedCategory, setSelectedCategory] = useState('All'); const subCategories = { Electronics: ['Phones', 'Laptops', 'Cameras', 'Television'], Fashion: ['Men', 'Women', 'Kids'], Furniture: ['Chairs', 'Tables', 'Beds', 'Sofas'], Appliances: ['Refrigerators', 'Washing Machines', 'Microwaves', 'Air Conditioners'], Beauty: ['Makeup', 'Skincare', 'Haircare', 'Fragrances'], Food: ['Groceries', 'Snacks', 'Beverages', 'Dairy'], }; return ( <>
